cells.data: select orders.order_id,products.product_name, users.first_name from orders join products on orders.product_id = products.product_id join users on  orders.user_id = users.id;
简写语法 as 的使用
select o.order_id,p.product_name, u.first_name from orders as o join products as p on o.product_id = p.product_id join users as u on  o.user_id = u.id;
SELECT Album.title, Artist.name FROM Album JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.id;
